title: Imaging analysis in all lighting and off weather conditions
objective:
The objective of the I-ALLOW project is therefore to study, design, develop and test an innovative approach which improves the safety of population and infrastructure in day time, night time and all-weather conditions by proving a state of the art multi-spectral imaging and processing system.
I-ALLOW will be able to:
ï             A low cost single sensor imaging solution with versatile capabilities. 
ï             Image in low light (night-time) conditions.
ï             Image in standard light (day-time) conditions.
ï             Image in harsh weather conditions (rain, snow, smog).
ï             Object detection based on multispectral data.
ï             Object detection based on 3D range data.
participants: SNCF MOBILITES;PROPRS Ltd.;AITEK SOCIETA' PER AZIONI;URZAD MORSKI W GDYNI;TECNOSITAF SPA CON UNICO SOCIO;BRIGHTWAY VISION LTD
